name: Steel plate; Blast furnace route; Production mix; 85% recovery rate
description:
This product flow represents IISI World Average for blast furnace plate.

This dataset is part of the  National Energy Technology Laboratory (NETL) Unit Process Library.  The NETL Unit Process Library is located on the NETL website (netl.doe.gov) under Research / Energy Analysis / Energy Trends and Issues / Life Cycle Analysis / Unit Process Library.  As of 6/30/2014, the URL for the NETL Unit Process Library is:  http://www.netl.doe.gov/research/energy-analysis/life-cycle-analysis/unit-process-library.
